recognize_text_from_remote_url.description: Recognizes text from a remotely-hosted image. Only works with one image in file

recognize_text_from_local_file.description: Recognizes text from a local image file. Only works with one image in file

detect_faces_from_remote_url.description: Detect faces from a remotely-hosted image. Only works with one image in file

detect_faces_from_local_file.description: Detect faces from a local image file. Only works with one image in file

classify_from_remote_url.description: Classify a remotely-hosted image. Only works with one image in file

classify_from_local_file.description: Classify a local image file. Only works with one image in file
